perpetual market implementation contract that inherits from other contracts.","methods":{"deposit(address,uint256)":{"details":"Emits LogIndex, LogAccountSettled, and LogDeposit events.","params":{"account":"The account for which to credit the deposit.","amount":"the amount of tokens to deposit."}},"enableFinalSettlement(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. The current result of the price oracle must be between the two bounds supplied. Emits the LogFinalSettlementEnabled event.","params":{"priceLowerBound":"The lower-bound (inclusive) of the acceptable price range.","priceUpperBound":"The upper-bound (inclusive) of the acceptable price range."}},"getAccountBalance(address)":{"params":{"account":"The address of the account to query the balances of."},"return":"The balances of the account."},"getAccountIndex(address)":{"params":{"account":"The address of the account to query the index of."},"return":"The index of the account."},"getAdmin()":{"return":"The EIP-1967 proxy admin"},"getFinalSettlementEnabled()":{"return":"True if final-settlement was enabled, false otherwise."},"getFunderContract()":{"return":"The address of the funder contract."},"getGlobalIndex()":{"return":"The most recently cached global index."},"getIsGlobalOperator(address)":{"params":{"operator":"The address of the operator to query the status of."},"return":"True if the address is a global operator, false otherwise."},"getIsLocalOperator(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to query the operator for.","operator":"The address of the operator to query the status of."},"return":"True if the operator is a local operator of the account, false otherwise."},"getMinCollateral()":{"return":"The minimum-acceptable collateralization ratio, returned as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals of precision."},"getOracleContract()":{"return":"The address of the price oracle contract."},"getOraclePrice()":{"details":"Only able to be called by global operators.","return":"The price returned by the current price oracle."},"getTokenContract()":{"return":"The address of the ERC20 token."},"hasAccountPermissions(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to query.","operator":"The address to query."},"return":"True if the operator has permission to operate the account,                  and false otherwise."},"initializeV1(address,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Once-only initializer function that replaces the constructor since this contract is proxied. Uses a non-colliding storage slot to store if this version has been initialized.Can only be called once and can only be called by the admin of this contract.","params":{"funder":"The address of the funder contract.","minCollateral":"The minimum allowed initial collateralization percentage.","oracle":"The address of the price oracle contract.","token":"The address of the token to use for margin-deposits."}},"setFunder(address)":{"details":"Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetFunder event.","params":{"funder":"The address of the new funder contract."}},"setGlobalOperator(address,bool)":{"details":"Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetGlobalOperator event.","params":{"approved":"True if approved, false if disapproved.","operator":"The address for which to enable or disable global operator privileges."}},"setLocalOperator(address,bool)":{"details":"Emits the LogSetLocalOperator event.","params":{"approved":"True for approval, false for disapproval.","operator":"The account that is approved or disapproved."}},"setMinCollateral(uint256)":{"details":"Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetMinCollateral event.","params":{"minCollateral":"The new value of the minimum initial collateralization percentage,                       as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals."}},"setOracle(address)":{"details":"Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetOracle event.","params":{"oracle":"The address of the new price oracle contract."}},"trade(address[],(uint256,uint256,address,bytes)[])":{"details":"Emits the LogIndex event, one LogAccountSettled event for each account in `accounts`, and the LogTrade event for each trade in `trades`.","params":{"accounts":"The sorted list of accounts that are involved in trades.","trades":"The list of trades to execute in-order."}},"withdraw(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emits LogIndex, LogAccountSettled, and LogWithdraw events.","params":{"account":"The account for which to debit the withdrawal.","amount":"The amount of tokens to withdraw.","destination":"The address to which the tokens are transferred."}},"withdrawFinalSettlement()":{"details":"Emits the LogAccountSettled and LogWithdrawFinalSettlement events."}},"title":"PerpetualV1"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"deposit(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Deposit some amount of margin tokens from the msg.sender into an account."},"enableFinalSettlement(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Enables final settlement if the oracle price is between the provided bounds."},"getAccountBalance(address)":{"notice":"Get the balance of an account, without accounting for changes in the index."},"getAccountIndex(address)":{"notice":"Gets the most recently cached index of an account."},"getFinalSettlementEnabled()":{"notice":"Gets the status of whether final-settlement was initiated by the Admin."},"getFunderContract()":{"notice":"Gets the current address of the funder contract."},"getGlobalIndex()":{"notice":"Gets the most recently cached global index."},"getIsGlobalOperator(address)":{"notice":"Gets the global operator status of an address."},"getIsLocalOperator(address,address)":{"notice":"Gets the local operator status of an operator for a particular account."},"getMinCollateral()":{"notice":"Gets minimum collateralization ratio of the protocol."},"getOracleContract()":{"notice":"Gets the current address of the price oracle contract."},"getOraclePrice()":{"notice":"Gets the price returned by the oracle."},"getTokenContract()":{"notice":"Gets the address of the ERC20 margin contract used for margin deposits."},"hasAccountPermissions(address,address)":{"notice":"Gets whether an address has permissions to operate an account."},"setFunder(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new funder contract."},"setGlobalOperator(address,bool)":{"notice":"Add or remove a Global Operator address."},"setLocalOperator(address,bool)":{"notice":"Grants or revokes permission for another account to perform certain actions on behalf of the sender."},"setMinCollateral(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets a new value for the minimum collateralization percentage."},"setOracle(address)":{"notice":"Sets a new price oracle contract."},"trade(address[],(uint256,uint256,address,bytes)[])":{"notice":"Submits one or more trades between any number of accounts."},"withdraw(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw some amount of margin tokens from an account to a destination address."},"withdrawFinalSettlement()":{"notice":"Withdraw the number of margin tokens equal to the value of the account at the time that final settlement occurred."}},"notice":"A market for a perpetual contract, a financial derivative which may be traded on margin and which aims to closely track the spot price of an underlying asset. The underlying asset is specified via the price oracle which reports its spot price. Tethering of the perpetual market price is supported by a funding oracle which governs funding payments between longs and nodes.name: PerpetualV1
initializeV1

attributes.name: PerpetualV1
initializeV1

devdoc.author: dYdX
devdoc.details: Main perpetual market implementation contract that inherits from other contracts.

deposit(address,uint256).details: Emits LogIndex, LogAccountSettled, and LogDeposit events.

params.account: The account for which to credit the deposit.
params.amount: the amount of tokens to deposit.

enableFinalSettlement(uint256,uint256).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. The current result of the price oracle must be between the two bounds supplied. Emits the LogFinalSettlementEnabled event.

params.priceLowerBound: The lower-bound (inclusive) of the acceptable price range.
params.priceUpperBound: The upper-bound (inclusive) of the acceptable price range.

params.account: The address of the account to query the balances of.
The address of the account to query the index of.

getFinalSettlementEnabled().return: True if final-settlement was enabled, false otherwise.

getFunderContract().return: The address of the funder contract.

getGlobalIndex().return: The most recently cached global index.

params.operator: The address of the operator to query the status of.

getIsGlobalOperator(address).return: True if the address is a global operator, false otherwise.

params.account: The account to query the operator for.
params.operator: The address of the operator to query the status of.

getIsLocalOperator(address,address).return: True if the operator is a local operator of the account, false otherwise.

getMinCollateral().return: The minimum-acceptable collateralization ratio, returned as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals of precision.

getOracleContract().return: The address of the price oracle contract.

getOraclePrice().details: Only able to be called by global operators.
getOraclePrice().return: The price returned by the current price oracle.

getTokenContract().return: The address of the ERC20 token.

hasAccountPermissions(address,address).return: True if the operator has permission to operate the account,                  and false otherwise.

initializeV1(address,address,address,uin.details: Once-only initializer function that replaces the constructor since this contract is proxied. Uses a non-colliding storage slot to store if this version has been initialized.Can only be called once and can only be called by the admin of this contract.

params.funder: The address of the funder contract.
params.minCollateral: The minimum allowed initial collateralization percentage.
params.oracle: The address of the price oracle contract.
params.token: The address of the token to use for margin-deposits.

setFunder(address).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetFunder event.

params.funder: The address of the new funder contract.

setGlobalOperator(address,bool).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetGlobalOperator event.

params.approved: True if approved, false if disapproved.
params.operator: The address for which to enable or disable global operator privileges.

params.approved: True for approval, false for disapproval.
params.operator: The account that is approved or disapproved.

setMinCollateral(uint256).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetMinCollateral event.

params.minCollateral: The new value of the minimum initial collateralization percentage,                       as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals.

setOracle(address).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetOracle event.

params.oracle: The address of the new price oracle contract.

trade(address[],(uint256,uint256,address.details: Emits the LogIndex event, one LogAccountSettled event for each account in `accounts`, and the LogTrade event for each trade in `trades`.

params.accounts: The sorted list of accounts that are involved in trades.
params.trades: The list of trades to execute in-order.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).details: Emits LogIndex, LogAccountSettled, and LogWithdraw events.

params.account: The account for which to debit the withdrawal.
params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.destination: The address to which the tokens are transferred.

withdrawFinalSettlement().details: Emits the LogAccountSettled and LogWithdrawFinalSettlement events.

devdoc.title: PerpetualV1

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit some amount of margin tokens from the msg.sender into an account.

enableFinalSettlement(uint256,uint256).notice: Enables final settlement if the oracle price is between the provided bounds.

getAccountBalance(address).notice: Get the balance of an account, without accounting for changes in the index.

getAccountIndex(address).notice: Gets the most recently cached index of an account.

getFinalSettlementEnabled().notice: Gets the status of whether final-settlement was initiated by the Admin.

getFunderContract().notice: Gets the current address of the funder contract.

getGlobalIndex().notice: Gets the most recently cached global index.

getIsGlobalOperator(address).notice: Gets the global operator status of an address.

getIsLocalOperator(address,address).notice: Gets the local operator status of an operator for a particular account.

getMinCollateral().notice: Gets minimum collateralization ratio of the protocol.

getOracleContract().notice: Gets the current address of the price oracle contract.

getOraclePrice().notice: Gets the price returned by the oracle.

getTokenContract().notice: Gets the address of the ERC20 margin contract used for margin deposits.

hasAccountPermissions(address,address).notice: Gets whether an address has permissions to operate an account.

setGlobalOperator(address,bool).notice: Add or remove a Global Operator address.

setLocalOperator(address,bool).notice: Grants or revokes permission for another account to perform certain actions on behalf of the sender.

setMinCollateral(uint256).notice: Sets a new value for the minimum collateralization percentage.

setOracle(address).notice: Sets a new price oracle contract.

trade(address[],(uint256,uint256,address.notice: Submits one or more trades between any number of accounts.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw some amount of margin tokens from an account to a destination address.

withdrawFinalSettlement().notice: Withdraw the number of margin tokens equal to the value of the account at the time that final settlement occurred.

userdoc.notice: A market for a perpetual contract, a financial derivative which may be traded on margin and which aims to closely track the spot price of an underlying asset. The underlying asset is specified via the price oracle which reports its spot price. Tethering of the perpetual market price is supported by a funding oracle which governs funding payments between longs and shorts.
